name: JMMJ
description:
Founded in 2008, Microsoft Certified Partner JMMJ specializes in custom-made software design and development supporting Cloud Computing. We have delivered over 200 projects for our clients. We implement projects for the most popular mobile and web technologies: .NET, iOS, Android. To support our clients, we have migrated many solutions to the Cloud to achieve a higher SLA level, on demand resource access, and cost-effective hosting.
Â 
JMMJ uses best practices in software development from analysis of customer requirements, preparing a detailed specification and designs, in-house quality assurance testing / user acceptance testing, post deployment support and maintenance.
